searchDocs.title: GitHub Token (Optional)â€‹
searchDocs.pageTitle: Git0: Git Package Manager with Zero Steps
searchDocs.content: For higher API rate limits, set your GitHub token:  export GITHUB_TOKEN=your_github_token_here   Without a token, you're limited to 60 requests per hour. With a token, you get 5,000 requests per hour.

searchDocs.title: What Happens After Downloadâ€‹
searchDocs.pageTitle: Git0: Git Package Manager with Zero Steps
searchDocs.content: Repository is downloaded to your current directoryProject type is detected automaticallyDependencies are installed based on project typeIDE is launched automatically (if available)Development server starts (for Node.js projects)  If a directory with the same name exists, git0 automatically appends a number (e.g., react-2, react-3).
